Objective of this manual
This manual has been developed to help health personnel who care for women during labour 
and childbirth to successfully use the LCG.
Target audience
The primary target audience for this manual is skilled health personnel directly providing 
labour and childbirth care in all settings. This includes midwives, nurses, general medical 
practitioners and obstetricians.
